resources.string: This podcast has not been downloaded.

Podax was created by Dan Goldstein. You can email me at dan@axelby.com with any comments or questions you have.

Podax is open source software. You can get the source code at http://github.com/thasmin/Podax. It is available under the 2 clause BSD license.

Podax uses the awesome ActionBarSherlock, ViewPagerIndicator and drag-sort-listview libraries.

Special thanks to everyone who\'s helped on Github:

  • Dan Scott
  • mcepl
  • yamatt
  • brimstone
  • yarikoptic
  • LegoChicken
  • ourToaster
  • untitaker
  • tgpraveen
Podax is set to only download podcasts when on Wi-fi.
Podax is set to download podcasts when connected to any network.
There are no podcasts in the queue that were not downloaded.
Podax will not update because there is no Wi-Fi connection. This can be changed in the preferences.
There are no podcasts in the queue.
Refresh the subscription to find the podcasts.

Thanks for using Podax! You\'re almost ready to enter the blossoming world of podcasts. All you need to do is subscribe to a podcast and Podax will do the rest. Visit the RSS link in the browser, type the RSS feed URL below, or choose one of our favorite podcasts below.
This American Life is a weekly podcast that tells interesting stories in otherwise mundane situations. It has won all of the major broadcasting awards.

Tom Merritt brings you "Tech News Today" with co-hosts Sarah Lane (TechTV, Revision3), Iyaz Akhtar (PC Mag, TechVi) and others. Get up to speed, with a fun and friendly ride through the need-to-know tech news of the day.
Oops, Podax has crashed. A bug report has been sent to the developers.
Only update subscriptions or download podcasts while connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Delete podcasts automatically when playback finishes or you skip to the next podcast. If disabled, the podcast will be added to the bottom of the queue.
When checked, playback will stop when headphones are disconnected.
Stop When Wired Headphones Are Unplugged
When checked, playback will stop when bluetooth headphones are disconnected.
Stop When Bluetooth Headphones Are Unplugged
When checked, Podax will resume playing when a bluetooth device connects.
Send anonymous usage data to improve Podax.
Send error reports to the developers if Podax crashes.
